Lyric:
[by:露露兮]
[ti:Malibu]
[ar:Kiso YVETTE]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:14.45]I never came to the beach, or stood by the ocean
[00:21.42]I never sat by the shore, under the sun with my feet in the sand
[00:27.20]But you brought me here and I'm happy that you did
[00:33.93]'Cause now I'm as free as birds catching the wind
[00:41.86]I always thought I would sink, so I never swam
[00:48.56]I never went boatin', don't get how they are floatin'
[00:51.99]And sometimes I get so scared of what I can't understand
[00:57.85]But here I am, next to you
[01:04.72]The sky's more blue in Malibu
[01:50.63]You would explain the current, as I just smile
[01:57.38]Hoping that you'll stay the same, and nothing will change
[02:01.36]And it'll be us, just for a while
[02:06.40]Do we even exist?
[02:09.85]That's when I make the wish, to swim away with the fish
[02:17.82]Is it supposed to be this hot all summer long?
[02:24.64]I never would've believed you if three years ago you told me
[02:29.43]I'd be here writing this song
[02:34.06]But here I am, next to you
[02:40.79]The sky's so blue in Malibu
